Dr. Rubric

Bitmaker Labs final project. A Ruby on Rails web application that makes it easier for professors to create rubrics, grade assignments and manage teaching assistants. The app is live at drrubric.herokuapp.com. Get in touch if you'd like the login/password.

Hipstarter

A Kickstarter clone now with more concrete and plaid. Built with Ruby on Rails and Bourbon, includes the ability to tag projects, make pledges and track funded projects on user pages. The app is live at hipstarter.herokuapp.com.

BeachColi

A Rails application built with two teammates for AngelHack June 2014. BeachColi scrapes E. coli data from the City of Toronto's open data portal and tells you whether it's safe to swim at each of Toronto's eleven beaches. The app is live at beachcoli.herokuapp.com.

Rainforest

Amazon clone built with Ruby on Rails. Features include AJAX-ified search functionality, ability for users to leave product reviews once logged in, validations.

SeatYourself

Restaurant reservation booking app built with Ruby on Rails. Features include search functionality, user models and validations.

Looking for a developer?

I'm currently seeking an opportunity to build great products in Canada or the European Union. Think we'd be a good fit? Check out my resume and get in touch.
